channel.title: IGN All
channel.description: The latest IGN news, reviews and videos about video games, movies, TV, tech and comics

item.title: New Fortnite Nerf Guns Are Out Just in Time for Season 10
item.description: When you can't the video game Fortnite, you can play IRL.
item.content:encoded:
Fortnite Season 10 has finally arrived, but that's not the only Fortnite news that's brewing today. Nerf has also released its Fall 2019 lineup of Fortnite-themed weapons. We have pictures and buy links for all the new foam munitions below. We've also picked out some of the coolest Fortnite Nerf weapons from previous releases, some of which are on sale. Let's get to it.

Nerf Fortnite RL Blaster

Continue reading…
item.dc:creator: Chris Reed

item.title: Everything You Need to Know About the Black Series Boba Fett Helmet
item.description: You can display it on your mantel, but if you don't have a mantel, it's padded and adjustable so you can just wear it constantly.
item.content:encoded:
Boba Fett is one of the most popular characters in the Star Wars universe, and his helmet is perhaps the most iconic after Darth Vader's. Unlike Vader, however, we never see him without his helmet, at least in the original trilogy, which makes it the only "face" we have representing the character.

Some people like to act like Boba Fett isn't awesome just because his death in the Sarlacc pit was underwhelming. If you're one of those people, this helmet isn't for you. However, if you love and appreciate the bad-assedeness Fett exudes, this amazing replica Mandalorian bounty-hunter helmet from Hasbro's Star Wars Black Series is something you should consider picking up.

Star Wars Black Series Boba Fett Electronic Helmet Preorder

Continue reading…
item.dc:creator: Seth G. Macy

item.title: Deal: Get a Samsung 75-inch 4K UHD HDR Smart TV for $999
item.description: Score 75-inches of 4K goodness on sale and get it delivered for free.
item.content:encoded:
If you're sick of looking at a puny 55-inch TV and you desperately want to upgrade to something a little more enormous, you can get a Samsung 75-inch 4K TV on sale right now at Walmart with free shipping. There's more than one chance to save on huge 4K TVs, too, with some other great deals live right now.

Samsung 75-inch NU7100 4K UHD Smart TV for $999.99

This 75-inch 4K TV from Samsung has 3 HDMI ports, smart features, includes a game mode, and has a 120hz effective refresh rate. Effective refresh rate is a little trick of technology, making motion appear smoother without actually increasing the refresh rate of the panel.

  • Samsung 75-inch 4K UHD TV Deal - Get it at Walmart for $999.99 ($2399.99 list price)

    • Continue reading…
item.dc:creator: Seth G. Macy

item.title: Twitch Streamers React to Ninja's Exclusive Move to Mixer
item.description: Twitch streamers and industry members react to Ninja's Mixer announcement.
item.content:encoded:
Video game streamer Tyler “Ninja” Blevins made the blockbuster announcement today that he is leaving Twitch to stream exclusively on Microsoft’s Mixer streaming platform. The news sent shockwaves across the streaming industry, and some of Twitch’s biggest stars shared their thoughts about the news online.

What Twitch Streamers are Saying About Ninja’s Move to Mixer

The immediate reaction was that of shock. Ninja was the first streamer to reach 10 million subscribers on Twitch, thanks to his work streaming games like Fortnite. And he made national headlines for streaming Fortnite with Drake.

Continue reading…
item.dc:creator: Matt Kim

item.title: Marvel's Runaways and Cloak and Dagger to Get Crossover Episode
item.description: The crossover episode will air during the third season of Marvel's Runaways in December.
item.content:encoded:
Marvel's Runaways and Marvel's Cloak and Dagger will get a crossover episode during the former's third season later this year.

All 10 episodes of Runaways Season 3 will be released December 13 on Hulu. Details on the crossover have not been revealed, though more information will be released closer to Season 3, according to Marvel.

The casts of Runaways and Cloak and Dagger (via Marvel)

Cloak and Dagger executive producer Joe Pokaski previously shared his excitement for a potential crossover with IGN. "I think there’s so much fun to be had and that’d be great," said Pokaski, "but there’s also the realities of this multi-million dollar industry that sometimes you can’t play as much as you want to."

Continue reading…
item.dc:creator: Jordan Sirani

item.title: Netflix's 13 Reasons Why to End After Season 4
item.description: Ahead of Season 3, the Netflix drama has been renewed for a fourth and final season.
item.content:encoded:
Netflix has renewed 13 Reasons Why for a fourth and final season, IGN has confirmed. The renewal comes a few weeks ahead of Season 3's August 23 release.

The drama's final season will follow the core cast's graduation from high school. Production on Season 4 is already underway, though Netflix hasn't revealed a Season 4 premiere date or episode count.

The forthcoming Season 3 will not include any depictions of suicide, according to a report from Variety. Netflix edited Season 1's three-minute suicide scene just last month, over two years after it was initially released. The decision was made "on the advice of medical experts," according to Netflix.

Continue reading…
item.dc:creator: Jordan Sirani

item.title: Most Apple Watches Are at Their Lowest Price Ever Now
item.description: Wrap a high-tech device around your wrist for cheap.
item.content:encoded:
Maybe you want an Apple Watch to use as a fitness tracker. Maybe you want an easy way to check your text messages and emails. Maybe you just think they look cool. Whatever the reason, if you're thinking about getting an Apple Watch, now is a great time to do it, because most models are available for their lowest prices to date on either Amazon or Walmart (and sometimes both). Read on for the Apple Watch deals available now.

item.title: The Best Samsung Galaxy S10 Deals for August 2019
item.description: Find all the best Galaxy S10 SIM-free and contract deals right here on IGN. Compare the very best deals on the new Samsung Galaxy S10 5G, or save a little cash by checking out Galaxy S10e deals.
item.content:encoded:
Finding the best Samsung S10 deals can be a difficult process, simply because of the model's high-end status. Samsung is considered one of the leading tech providers globally, with the South Korean smartphones featuring in every mobile retail store around the UK.

There are actually plenty of Galaxy S10 deals to be found, especially on the latest Samsung Galaxy devices, such as the Galaxy S10 5G and the more affordable Galaxy S10e. The S10 5G was one of the first phones in the UK to harness the potential of 5G, and you can now use the device with spectacular 5G deals from the likes of EE and Vodafone, with O2 and Three following up with 5G coverage later in 2019.

    Continue reading…
item.dc:creator: Robert Anderson

item.title: Poison, Lucia, and E. Honda are Coming to Street Fighter 5: Arcade Edition
item.description: Street Fighter 5's newest DLC may have just leaked on Steam.
item.content:encoded:
Update: Capcom officially confirmed Poison, Lucia, and E. Honda as upcoming fighters for Street Fighter 5: Arcade Edition, coming August 4.

These additions will bring the lineup to a total of 38 playable characters, and you can check out a new look at the additional characters in the gallery below:

Capcom confirmed each new Street Fighter 5 DLC character will be available for $5.99 individually or 100,000 Fight Money.

A bundle featuring all three characters will be made available on August 5 for $14.99, and will also include each character’s Battle Costume and Default Colors 3-10.

Original story follows:

Capcom’s next set of DLC fighters may have just leaked on Steam ahead of their EVO 2019 reveal. A new trailer published on Street Fighter 5’s Steam page showed off three new characters not yet in the game: E. Honda, Lucia, and Poison.

Continue reading…
item.dc:creator: Matt Kim

item.title: Which Tabletop RPG Is Right For You?
item.description: With so many to choose from, starting your adventure can be difficult.
item.content:encoded:
UPDATE: It's time for GenCon 2019! This four-day celebration of tabletop games always coincides with some of the biggest releases in the world of analog gaming, so we've updated our list accordingly.

There's a veritable ocean of tabletop RPGs out there, and it can be a daunting task to find the game that best fits your gaming group. Whether you're looking for a new game to try or just curious what all the fuss is after hearing about that crazy Kickstarter for Critical Role or watching the latest season of Stranger Things, here are some of our favorite tabletop RPGs across all genres and systems.

Continue reading…
item.dc:creator: Jon Ryan

item.title: Fortnite Season 10 Launches Today - Here's All the Changes
item.description: Fortnite Season 10 is adding plenty of new features, including mech suits and old locations from seasons past.
item.content:encoded:
Fortnite Season 10 releases today, and it brings a whole host of big changes and new additions to the world’s most popular battle royale. To help get you off to a head start we have the full patch notes and details on the Week 1 challenges, as well as details on map changes, updates to Save the World, and the new BRUTE mech that’s stomping its way into Battle Royale.

And of course, if you're looking to bring a little bit of Fortnite into the real world, some new Fortnite Nerf guns are out in time for Season 10.

Fortnite Season 10 Biggest Changes and New Features

Continue reading…
item.dc:creator: Matt Purslow

item.title: Destiny 2: Shadowkeep Delayed 2 Weeks
item.description: Destiny 2's upcoming expansion and free-to-play model have been pushed from September to October.
item.content:encoded:
Destiny 2: Shadowkeep and New Light, its free-to-play version, have been delayed to October 1. They were initially scheduled to be released on September 17.

Cross save support, which was announced alongside New Light, is still scheduled for "later this summer," according to Bungie.

"Being independent means that the future of Destiny 2 is entirely on our team," the developer wrote on its blog. "It also means that we’re agile enough to choose to do what's best for the game and our players, even if it's the hard choice."

Announced in June, Shadowkeep takes players back to the Moon from the original Destiny. The standalone expansion costs $35 USD.

Continue reading…
item.dc:creator: Jordan Sirani

item.title: MK11: First Nightwolf Gameplay Revealed
item.description: The Native America warrior is back in this trailer for MK11's next DLC.
item.content:encoded:
NetherRealm has revealed the first gameplay footage of Nightwolf in Mortal Kombat 11.

The Native American warrior was originally announced as an upcoming fighter when they revealed the initial gameplay of Shang Tsung back in June. The Kombat Pack, which will contain Sindel and Todd McFarlane's Spawn in addition to Shang Tsung and Nightwolf (plus two as-of-yet unannounced characters), retails for $39.99 USD. Nightwolf will be available as of Tuesday, August 13, 2019.

What do you think of Nightwolf's return? Let us know in the comments, or check out what we thought of the Shang Tsung DLC when it released.

Continue reading…
item.dc:creator: IGN Staff

item.title: Cyberpunk 2077 Card Game Announced
item.description: Cyberpunk is getting a getting a drafting game set in the world of 2077.
item.content:encoded:
Today tabletop game developer CMON announced Cyberpunk 2077 - Afterlife: The Card Game, an upcoming card game based in the world of Cyberpunk 2077.

Afterlife is a card drafting game that puts players in the role of Fixers, who are people in the Cyberpunk universe that hire cyberpunks (like the 2077 video game’s main character) to do jobs for them. You’ll draft cards to help you complete missions, which then raises your Street Cred until you eventually win the game.

The box for Cyberpunk 2077 – Afterlife: The Card Game.

Continue reading…
item.dc:creator: Tom Marks

item.title: Bloodstained Developers Give an Update on Highly Requested Nintendo Switch Patch
item.description: Here's when you can expect the Nintendo Switch patch for Bloodstained: Symphony of the Night
item.content:encoded:
In a new blog post ArtPlay and 505 Games offered an update for when Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night for the Nintendo Switch may finally receive the performance improvements that were promised after the game was released.

What’s Wrong With Bloodstained on Switch?

When Bloodstained was released, players on the Nintendo Switch were disappointed to find that the Switch version seemed to suffer issues not present on other consoles. This included some serious frame rate and optimization problems that sometimes made Bloodstained run at 15 FPS, even when the game is capped at 30 FPS on the Switch.

Continue reading…
item.dc:creator: Matt Kim

item.title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare - Here's What Comes in Each Edition
item.description: From preorder bonuses to what comes in each edition, here's everything you need to know to preorder Call of Duty: Modern Warfare.
item.content:encoded:
Call of Duty: Modern Warfare is a brand-new game that's set to launch on PS4, Xbox One, and PC on October 25, 2019. Aside from a few returning characters, it's not connected to the previous games in the sub-series. Unlike last year's installment, it will have a full single-player campaign and, in a first for the series, it will feature cross-platform multiplayer. Activision and Infinity Ward also said it won't include a season pass, so all players will get free maps and access to post-launch events.

If you're ready to preorder Call of Duty: Modern Warfare, you'll want to know about the preorder bonuses and what comes in each edition. We've compiled all the information below.

Continue reading…
item.dc:creator: Chris Reed

item.title: Ava DuVernay Confirms Darkseid and the Female Furies for DC's New Gods
item.description: New Gods co-writers Tom King and Ava DuVernay may finally be teasing the inclusion of Darkseid in their upcoming film.
item.content:encoded:
Update 8/1: Ava DuVernay has confirmed that Darkseid and the Female Furies will both appear in the big screen adaptation of DC's New Gods.

The writer-director offered fresh updates on the forthcoming comic book movie in an AMA on Twitter earlier this week.

In response to fans' questions, DuVernay revealed a couple of the major villains that will be involved in the project, adding that she was "keeping an open mind" on potential casting choices.

How could any self-respecting Barda fan not include the The Furies?! I’m looking forward to them so much. #AskAva https://t.co/83zD6PeFBx

Continue reading…
item.dc:creator: Brian Barnett
